front.title: The Call Type tel URI Parameter for Session Initiation Protocol (SIP)

abstract.t: This document describes a standardized mechanism to convey the "CallType" parameter in tel Uniform Resource Identifiers (URIs). A newextension to the tel URI is defined for this purpose.Call Type is a form of classification of a dialed number in atelephony call; it classifies the call as a Local-Call, Toll-Call,International-Call, etc. A definition of each Call Type addressed inthis specification is provided in Section 2.
